metadata.title: Comparative performance of four nucleic acid amplification tests for SARS-CoV-2 virus 2

abstract.original_text: Coronavirus disease 2019 can be screened and diagnosed through the 20 detection of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) by 21 real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction. SARS-CoV-2 nucleic acid 22 39 SARS-CoV-2 NAATs.
